subject: Re: RFI 20252027 License Plate Recognition Systems
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Michelle, 

Thank you sending this. We fully intend to respond to the RFI.
 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/b8eff56f-0ccc-403d-9c93-9bcf2aabf945.gif> 

On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 1:50?PM HAHN Michelle L <MHahn@eugene-or.gov MHahn@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Hello,

	 

	The City of Eugene issued a Request for Information (RFI) on 11/6/24 for License Plate Recognition Systems that you might be interested in. Please see attached.

	 

	Be sure to log onto, or create an account with, OregonBuys to submit your offer letter or express interest in the RFI. This will ensure you receive any future addenda.

	 

	www.oregonbuys.gov http://www.oregonbuys.gov/ 

	 

	Offer Letters are due by December 11, 2024 by the due time listed on the RFI.

	 

	Please contact me if you have any questions. 

	 

	Best regards,

	 

	 

	Michelle Hahn, OPBC

	Purchasing Analyst

	City of Eugene / Finance

	500 E. 4th Ave, Suite 303

	Eugene, OR 97401

	MHahn@eugene-or.gov Michelle.L.Hahn@ci.eugene.or.us
